title: Doodles to Produce NFT Film Featuring Pharrell & Lil Wayne
description: Yesterday, Doodles, one of the top non-fungible token projects, announced an upcoming animated film featuring Pharrell Williams, Lil Wayne, and Coi Leray. Called ‘Dullsville and the Doodleverse,’ the special will feature an original soundtrack and three music videos, merging the company’s iconic artistic style with a cinematic filter.
